Timeline

My Cornell Journey and Projects

  • Jun 2018 - Present

    WearWorks

    I worked as a software engineer intern at WearWorks, working on app dev and an alexa skill. AWS startups video of WearWorks, I appear at the end.

  • April 2018 - Jun 2018

    Cornell Policy Review

    I fixed some design problems for CPR's website which is hosted on wordpress.

    Cornell Policy Review

  • March 2018

    Cornell Animal Health Hackathon

    In March, I worked with Stephanie Isenman, Robert Laughlin, and Sarah Jeon on Stay on Stray. Sarah and I worked on protoyping the app. Although the protoype is no longer available, here is the presentation of our idea.

    Stay on Stray

  • Oct 2017 - May 2018

    Human-Robot Collaboration and Companionship Research Group

    I worked for HRC under Professor Guy Hoffman on a wordpress website and then on an opensource github website. Both are linked.

    WP website Git website

  • Aug 2017 - Present

    Cornell University, College of Engineering

    At Cornell, I studied Computer Science and minored in business. I have recieved Dean's List every semester and I am an Irwin and Joan Jacobs Scholar.

  • Sept 2013 - Jun 2017

    Bridgewater Raritan HS

    I attended BRHS where I graduated at the top 5% of my class of 750 students. I took AP Computer Science and AP CS Principles and recieved a 5 on both AP exams.

  • My CS
    Adventure

Awards

Sept 2016, I recieved the AWISNJ scholarship and was honored at the State assembly. AWSNJ article
Sept 2017, I became a Jacobs Engineering Scholar and recieved the Joan and Jacobs Scholarship from Cornell, presented to me by the Dean of Engineering Lance Collins.
